english: to state; to extend; 9th Earthly Branch

etymology.description: Pictogram — a bolt of lightning; original character of 電 and 神.
etymology.interpretation: Originally depicted a streak of lightning; that ancient graph later split into specialized forms like 電 for “lightning” and 神 for “spirit.” Through semantic shift and phonetic loan, 申 came to mean “to state/report” and to name the 9th Earthly Branch, and it now often serves as a phonetic element in compounds.

examples.chinese: 他已向法院申诉(他已向法院申訴)。
examples.english: He has already appealed to the court.

examples.chinese: 请按时申报材料(請按時申報材料)。
examples.english: Please submit the materials on time.

examples.chinese: 申时大约是下午三点到五点(申時大約是下午三點到五點)。
examples.pinyin: Shēnshí dàyuē shì xiàwǔ sān diǎn dào wǔ diǎn.
examples.english: Shenshi is roughly from 3 to 5 p.m.
